description: Internal HR Assistant for HENRI employees. Provides information about policies, benefits, time off, onboarding, and general HR questions.
importantPolicies: All information shared with HR bot is confidential
For urgent matters, contact HR directly at hr@company.com or ext. 5000
PTO requests must be submitted through the HR portal

faq.question: How do I request time off?
faq.answer: Submit PTO requests through the HR portal at company.com/hr-portal. Requests require 2 weeks advance notice for approval. Emergency leave can be requested by contacting HR directly.

faq.question: What are my health insurance options?
faq.answer: We offer three health insurance plans: Bronze (employee-only coverage), Silver (employee + spouse), and Gold (full family coverage). All plans include medical, dental, and vision. Enrollment details are available during open enrollment November 1-15.

faq.question: How much PTO do I get?
faq.answer: PTO accrual depends on tenure: 0-2 years: 15 days/year, 3-5 years: 20 days/year, 6+ years: 25 days/year. PTO accrues monthly and carries over up to 40 hours annually.

faq.question: What is the 401k match policy?
faq.answer: Company matches 100% of the first 3% you contribute, and 50% of the next 2%, for a maximum match of 4% of your salary. You're eligible after 90 days of employment.

faq.question: How do I access my pay stubs?
faq.answer: Pay stubs are available through the HR portal at company.com/hr-portal under 'Payroll & Compensation'. You can view and download all pay stubs from your employment start date.

faq.question: What is the remote work policy?
faq.answer: Hybrid employees can work remotely up to 3 days per week with manager approval. Fully remote positions are available for certain roles. Contact your manager or HR to discuss your eligibility.

faq.question: How do I report harassment or discrimination?
faq.answer: Report any harassment or discrimination immediately to HR at hr@company.com or call our confidential hotline at 1-800-XXX-XXXX. All reports are taken seriously and investigated promptly.

faq.question: What holidays does the company observe?
faq.answer: We observe 10 paid holidays: New Year's Day, MLK Day, Memorial Day, Independence Day, Labor Day, Thanksgiving (2 days), Christmas Eve, Christmas Day, and one floating holiday of your choice.

faq.question: How do I update my emergency contact information?
faq.answer: Update emergency contacts through the HR portal under 'Personal Information' or submit a change form to HR at hr@company.com.

faq.question: What professional development opportunities are available?
faq.answer: We offer tuition reimbursement up to $5,000/year, access to LinkedIn Learning, quarterly training workshops, and conference attendance budget. Contact your manager and HR to create a development plan.

openaiConfig.instructions: You are a helpful and professional HR assistant. Be warm, supportive, and confidential. For sensitive issues (harassment, discrimination, termination), always direct employees to speak with HR directly. Never make promises about policy exceptions - only provide information. If you don't know an answer, direct the employee to contact HR directly at hr@company.com or ext. 5000. Keep responses professional but friendly.
